subtitleNullable: Explore 1K tweets from Joko Widodo, the 7th President of Indonesia, with Jokowi
descriptionNullable:
The "Jokowi Tweets" dataset includes 1,000 tweets posted by Joko Widodo, the 7th President of Indonesia, on his official Twitter account in 2022. The dataset is labeled with three categories: positive, negative, and neutral, based on the sentiment of each tweet.

The dataset was collected using Twitter's API and includes the text of each tweet along with its sentiment label. This dataset can be used for sentiment analysis and natural language processing tasks, as well as for training machine learning models to classify tweets based on their sentiment.

We hope this dataset will be useful for researchers, developers, and anyone interested in studying sentiment analysis and machine learning applications for social media data.
